content:
### Bug fixes * **core:** Add logs and error catches for possible failures in queue mode.
* [AWS Lambda Node:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.awslambda.md) Fix Invocation Type > Continue Workflow. * [Supabase Node:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.supabase/index.md) Send token also using Authorization Bearer; fix Row > Get operation. * [Xero Node:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.xero.md) Fix some operations and add support for setting address and phone number. * [Wise Node:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.wise.md) Fix issue when executing a transfer.
